mapper.sql: ID,POLICY_ID, PRODUCT_ID, INSURANCE_ID, USER_ID, ORDER_NO, PAY_ORDER_NO, STATUS, APPLY_TIME, UNDERWRITIND_TIME, PAY_TIME, VALIDATE_DATE, EXPIRE_DATE, END_TIME, APPLICANT_ID, INSURED_ID, APPLY_NUM, TOTAL_PREM, TOTAL_REVENUE, PREM, REPAY_AMOUNT, SEND_CODE, POLICY_CODE, PROPOSAL_NO, COMMENTS, ISVALID, CREATE_DATE, POLICY_URL, UPDATE_DATE, RELATION, ACCUMULATED_INCOME, YESDAY_INCOME,LOANABLE_AMOUNT,CHANL_FLOW_NO
mapper.update: update T_POLICY_MASTER SET ISVALID='0' where POLICY_ID = #{policyId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into T_POLICY_MASTER (POLICY_ID, PRODUCT_ID, INSURANCE_ID, USER_ID, ORDER_NO, PAY_ORDER_NO, STATUS, APPLY_TIME, UNDERWRITIND_TIME, PAY_TIME, VALIDATE_DATE, EXPIRE_DATE, END_TIME, APPLICANT_ID, INSURED_ID, APPLY_NUM, TOTAL_PREM, TOTAL_REVENUE, PREM, REPAY_AMOUNT, SEND_CODE, POLICY_CODE, PROPOSAL_NO, COMMENTS, ISVALID, CREATE_DATE, POLICY_URL, UPDATE_DATE, RELATION, ACCUMULATED_INCOME, YESDAY_INCOME,LOANABLE_AMOUNT,CHANL_FLOW_NO) values (#{policyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{insuranceId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{underwritindTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{validateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{applicantId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{insuredId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{applyNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalPrem,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalRevenue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prem,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{repayAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sendCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{policyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proposalNo}, #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '1', NOW(), #{policyUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(), #{relation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accuIncome}, #{yesDayIncome}, #{loanableAmount},#{chanlFlowNo})
mapper.select: select from T_POLICY_MASTER where POLICY_ID = #{policyId,jdbcType=CHAR} AND ISVALID = '1'
select from T_POLICY_MASTER where CHANL_FLOW_NO = #{chanlFlowNo,jdbcType=CHAR} AND ISVALID = '1'

select a.POLICY_ID,a.APPLY_TIME,a.PAY_TIME,a.VALIDATE_DATE,a.EXPIRE_DATE,a.CHANL_FLOW_NO, a.STATUS,a.POLICY_CODE,a.SEND_CODE,a.TOTAL_PREM,a.TOTAL_REVENUE, a.APPLICANT_ID,a.INSURED_ID,b.HESITATE_TERM,a.ACCUMULATED_INCOME,a.YESDAY_INCOME, b.PRODUCT_ID,b.PRODUCT_NAME,b.PRODUCT_PERIOD,b.PERIOD_TYPE,b.PRODUCT_TYPE,b.EXPECT_RATE
from T_POLICY_MASTER as a left join T_PRODUCT as b on a.PRODUCT_ID=b.PRODUCT_ID where a.ISVALID = '1' AND a.USER_ID = #{userId} and a.STATUS >= #{status} order by a.CREATE_DATE desc
